name: student-faculty-evaluation
description: UPHSD Student Faculty Evaluation Form - React + Express

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:evaluate: npx playwright install chromium && ts-node-dev --transpile-only --project tsconfig.json test-student-evaluation.ts
scripts.test:evaluate:headless: npx playwright install chromium && ts-node-dev --transpile-only --project tsconfig.json test-student-evaluation.ts --headless
